p: {{platform_title}} is a free and open source technology to document, visualize and share different types of information. Until now, Oblo has focused on documenting the impacts of climate change perceived by local people.

{{platform_title}} allows creating online platforms designed as progressive web-apps (PWA), in which users can visualize existing geolocalized data and contribute new data from any device and while in the field.
If you want to know more about the source code, check out GitLab page https://gitlab.com/licci
